org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.querymatcher

接口 DeleteTracker

  • 所有超级接口:
    ShipperListener
    所有已知实现类:
    NewVersionBehaviorTracker, ScanDeleteTracker

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public interface DeleteTracker
extends ShipperListener
    This interface is used for the tracking and enforcement of Deletes during the course of a Get or Scan operation.

    This class is utilized through three methods:

    • add(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.Cell) when encountering a Delete
    • isDeleted(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.Cell) when checking if a Put Cell has been deleted
    • update() when reaching the end of a StoreFile

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  DeleteTracker.DeleteResult
      Returns codes for delete result.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void add(Cell cell)
      Add the specified cell to the list of deletes to check against for this row operation.
      CellComparator getCellComparator()
      Return the comparator passed to this delete tracker
      DeleteTracker.DeleteResult isDeleted(Cell cell)
      Check if the specified cell buffer has been deleted by a previously seen delete.
      boolean isEmpty() 
      void reset()
      Called between rows.
      void update()
      Called at the end of every StoreFile.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.ShipperListener

        beforeShipped

    • 方法详细资料

      • add

        void add(Cell cell)
        Add the specified cell to the list of deletes to check against for this row operation.

        This is called when a Delete is encountered in a StoreFile.

        参数:
        cell - - the delete cell

      • isDeleted

        DeleteTracker.DeleteResult isDeleted(Cell cell)
        Check if the specified cell buffer has been deleted by a previously seen delete.
        参数:
        cell - - current cell to check if deleted by a previously seen delete
        返回:
        deleteResult The result tells whether the Cell is deleted and why

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        返回:
        true if there are no current delete, false otherwise

      • update

        void update()
        Called at the end of every StoreFile.

        Many optimized implementations of Trackers will require an update at when the end of each StoreFile is reached.

      • reset

        void reset()
        Called between rows.

        This clears everything as if a new DeleteTracker was instantiated.

      • getCellComparator

        CellComparator getCellComparator()
        Return the comparator passed to this delete tracker
        返回:
        the cell comparator
